Name: Caliper 2
About the game: Caliper 2 is an absolute, turn-based puzzle. By manipulating objects with different properties, you need to put some object on the button and enter the portal. Objects have both common and unique properties. Every 5 levels an object is added with unique properties, the combination of which gives a variety of solutions to riddles. Stone as the simplest object. Blocks glide over the snow. Ice is like snow, but you can kick it. Cart carries blocks. Rubble will not allow ice to slide. Coal will melt the snow and ice. The freezer will turn everything into ice. Flamethrower will melt the ice. The twins copy each other's movements.
